text: Louise of Sweden (; 31 October 1851 – 20 March 1926) was Queen of Denmark from 1906 until 1912 as the spouse of King Frederick VIII. Louise was daughter of King Charles XV of Sweden and Norway and Louise of the Netherlands. In 1869, she married the future King Frederick VIII of Denmark. Louise became queen of Denmark in 1906. Louise was the mother of both King Christian X of Denmark and King Haakon VII of Norway. ==References== ==Other websites== * Aage Friis II:s förhållande till Danmark och Nordslesvig * Royal House of Sweden * Royal House of Denmark * Queen Lovisa at the website of the Royal Danish Collection at Amalienborg Palace |- Category:1851 births Category:1926 deaths Category:Danish royal consorts Category:House of Bernadotte Category:Norwegian princesses Louise 1851 Category:People from Stockholm
title: Louise of Sweden
